cwn_entry.cwn_what:
xml2cd is a cduce preprocessor that lets you embed cduce expressions in an xml files (and vice-versa) à la php (but with the nice cduce type checking). It supports namespaces, automatic dtd downloading etc...
http://reglisse.ens.fr/ecduce/Download.html
Get it while it hot!
or read an introduction:
http://reglisse.ens.fr/ecduce/Getting_to_know_xml2cd.html
Note: this application is not production ready and there might even be some changes in the future that will break compatibility. This is an ongoing university project I need your feedback to make better. I WILL pay close attention to user's comments. Hopefully this info will help me move into beta land (and be less of a moving target).
P.S. Thanks the whole cduce team for there support specially Alain for many late night fixes and Kim for tutoring me.
